sentences.en: " The impulse of thy strength, only less free Than thou, 0 Uncontrollable! "
sentences.cn: 假如我分有你的脉搏, 仅仅不如你那么自由, 哦,无法约束的生命!

sentences.en: A sudden impulse of anger arose in him.
After lunch she decided on impulse to take a bath.
sentences.cn: 午饭后她突然兴起，决定洗个澡。

sentences.en: All day she had fought off the impulse to telephone Harry.
sentences.cn: 她一整天都在克制自己想给哈里打电话的冲动。

sentences.en: He felt an irresistible impulse to rush into the room.
sentences.cn: 他有一种难以抗拒的冲动想冲进房间.

sentences.en: He finally gave way to an impulse and pulled her toward him.
sentences.cn: 他最终还是没能抑制住冲动，把她拉向了自己。

sentences.en: He still couldn't understand the impulse that had made him confide in Cassandra.
sentences.cn: 他仍然难以理解是什么样的冲动使他向卡桑德拉吐露了秘密。

sentences.en: I don't know how to resist my impulse.
sentences.cn: 我不知道怎样抑制自己的感情冲动.

sentences.en: It is the passions which provide the main impulse of music.
sentences.cn: 激情是音乐创作的主要动力。

sentences.en: Many people act on impulse without counting the cost.
sentences.cn: 很多人不考虑后果就莽撞行事。

sentences.en: Sean's a fast thinker, and he acts on impulse.
sentences.cn: 肖恩是个思维敏捷、行事随兴的人。

sentences.en: She wrote that letter on impulse.
sentences.cn: 她一时冲动写了这封信.

sentences.en: The curtains were an impulse buy.
sentences.cn: 窗帘是一时兴起买下的。

sentences.en: The erotic impulse is sublimated into art.
The eye converts light signals to nerve impulses.
sentences.cn: 眼睛把光信号转变成神经冲动。

sentences.en: Unable to resist the impulse, he glanced at the sea again.
sentences.cn: 他抑制不住冲动，又向海面瞥了一眼。

sentences.en: Wade resisted an impulse to smile.
sentences.cn: 韦德强忍住想笑的冲动。

words.tran_cn: 冲动的；受感情驱使的；任性的

phrases.tran_cn: 即兴购买；未经考虑仅凭一时冲动的购物行为
脉冲函数；冲力函数；冲击函数
响应函数；脉冲响应函数；反应函数
冲力式涡轮机；冲击式汽轮机；水戽式（冲击式）水轮机
冲击电压；冲荤压；脉冲电压
一时冲动，一时心血来潮

trans.tran_cn: 凭冲动行事，突如其来的念头，[电子]脉冲，[医]冲动，搏动
trans.tran_en: a sudden strong desire to do something without thinking about whether it is a sensible thing to do
